alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chittenden; Orange; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 11:54PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A snow squall will impact portions of north central Orange, southeastern Chittenden and central Washington Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1153 PM EDT, A snow squall was observed near Bolton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds 35 mph or greater, and visibility less than a half mile. SOURCE...Radar and VTRANS weather station indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and will blow around unsecured objects. Low visibility will pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Barre, Montpelier, Northfield Village, Huntington, Duxbury, Northfield, Waterbury Village, Moretown, East Montpelier, Barre City, Berlin, Williamstown, E F Knapp State Airport, Middlesex, Barre Town, Waterbury, Calais, Bolton, Waitsfield and Plainfield. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 42 and 71.
